entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near 11. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
